About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Jason Diep

I am a web developer and designer who has a passion for learning new technology. I have been learning for 4 months and currently looking for a junior web developer/designer position as I wish to become more flexible in my work. I enjoy spending time watching web development videos on YouTube particularly by Stefan Mischook, Traversy, and Dev Ed. I have learned how to use HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Git|GitHub, npm, Sass, Swup, MySQL, and PHP. Currently I am learning React as it is the most desired framework for Frontend development and I would like to specialise in Frontend development. Other than coding, I enjoy spending time with friends and family, going to the gym, and playing badminton.
